name: Dream Tower HD
description:
Designed for the New iPad's Retina display!

We all dream about having our own skyscraper full of beautiful and amazing stores. Now let’s build it!

★ Crystal clear images for the New iPad's Retina display
★ Add beautiful homes and tons of unique stores, like Hand Bag and Flower Shop
★ Take gorgeous elevators to see its amazing speed and enjoy the ride
★ Keep residents busy and match residents’ skills to their job to earn bonus
★ Game Center integration

If you have any questions, visit our website or send email to support@deacent.com.
